remarks: The quotient topology is unaffected by restriction to the base set. This property makes it slightly more convenient to use, since we don't have to require that ` F ` be a function with domain ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)
statement:
qtopval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
qtopres $p |- ( F e. V -> ( J qTop F ) = ( J qTop ( F |` X ) ) ) $.
